definition: way of doing sth/the right social connection

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
to use social connections/to toady to influential people
to seek help from social connections

sentences.english: We should open all possible avenues and try all possible means to settle problems that arise.
sentences.chinese: 要广开门路，多想办法，千方百计，解决问题。

sentences.english: He and Wang Shuo had all the necessary contacts.
sentences.chinese: 他和王朔都认识出版必要的熟人门路。

sentences.english: Only by sticking to the socialist road can we do away with the root cause of poverty. (p. 330)
sentences.chinese: 只有坚定走社会主义门路才华挖失落穷根。

sentences.english: Bvoid roads, bridges, or ramps that might have been damaged by the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 制止门路，桥梁，或者有可能已经被地动损坏的斜道。

sentences.english: However, it is impossible for you to make it if you have no connections with the government.
sentences.chinese: 但是，如果你没有门路的话，是不可能行的。

sentences.english: Efforts should be made to create more production and employment channels for rural laborers .
sentences.chinese: 要为农村劳动力开辟更多的生产门路和就业门路。

sentences.english: Efforts should be made to create more production and employment channels for rural laborers .
sentences.chinese: 要为农村劳动力开辟更多的生产门路和就业门路。

sentences.english: Then he thinks other way with respect to actuate brain.
sentences.chinese: 于是他就开动脑子想其它门路。

sentences.english: We have opened up more avenues of employment.
Um…well, talk about connections, are those all beef dogs?
sentences.chinese: 嗯，咳，说到门路广，那门热狗是纯牛肉的吗？

sentences.english: There are dozens of things we could do that would create jobs.
sentences.chinese: 只要我们肯做，创造就业机会的门路有很多。

sentences.english: He pulled wires and got us a room at the crowded hotel.
sentences.chinese: 他走门路，给我们在客满的旅馆里弄到了一间空房。

sentences.english: Second, we will expand employment opportunities for rural migrant workers in cities while stabilizing their existing jobs.
sentences.chinese: 二是广开农民工就业门路和稳定现有就业岗位。

sentences.english: They've been highly successful and they provide us with a way to resolve the grain shortage problem.
sentences.chinese: 很成功，为解决缺粮问题找到了一条门路。

sentences.english: He wants to cyber detective novels field.
sentences.chinese: 他想在侦察小说范畴另辟门路。

sentences.english: Those who can are taking their relatives to hospitals in other places.
sentences.chinese: 有门路的都带着亲戚去了其他地方的医院。

definition: to use social connections/to toady to influential people
to seek help from social connections
see 走門路|走门路[zou3 men2 lu4]
to seek contact with sb for one's own benefit/to suck up to sb
a way out (lit. and fig.)/opportunity for advancement/a way forward/outlet (for one's products)
